text: The JC Ferrero Challenger Open is a professional tennis tournament played on clay courts. It is currently part of the Association of Tennis Professionals (ATP) Challenger Tour. It is held annually in Alicante, Spain since 2018. ==Past finals== ===Singles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champion !width="200"|Runner-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2018 || Pablo Andújar || Alex de Minaur || 7–6(7–5), 6–1 |- | 2019 || Pablo Andújar || Pedro Martínez || 6–3, 3–6, 6–3 |- | 2020 || Carlos Alcaraz || Pedro Martínez || 7–6(8–6), 6–3 |} ===Doubles=== {|class="wikitable" style="font-size:90%" |- !Year !width="200"|Champions !width="200"|Runners-up !width="175"|Score |- | 2018 || Wesley Koolhof Artem Sitak || Guido Andreozzi Ariel Behar || 6–3, 6–2 |- | 2019 || Thomaz Bellucci Guillermo Durán || Gerard Granollers Pedro Martínez || 2–6, 7–5, [10–5] |- | 2020 || Enzo Couacaud Albano Olivetti || Íñigo Cervantes Oriol Roca Batalla || 4–6, 6–4, [10–2] |} ==References== Category:ATP Challenger Tour Category:Clay court tennis tournaments Category:Tennis tournaments in Spain Category:Recurring sporting events established in 2018
title: JC Ferrero Challenger Open
